```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(parsons)
library(magrittr)
```


## Example

Try this programming problem: 

```{r iris, echo=FALSE}
question_parsons(
  initial = c(
    "iris",
    "mutate(...)",
    "summarize(...)",
    "print()"
  ),
  pass_if(
    c(
      "iris",
      "mutate(...)",
      "summarize(...)"
    )
  ),
  fail_if(
    ~length(.) < 2,
    message = "Include at least two answers"
  ),
  fail_if(
    function(x){"print()" %in% x},
    message = "You should not include print() in your answer"
  ),
  fail_if(
    ~{.[1] != "iris"},
    message = "Your solution should start with 'iris'"
  )
)
```
